snippet: The New Republic, the nearly century-old magazine that helped define modern American liberalism, has been put up for sale, people briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.
abstract: The New Republic, the nearly century-old magazine that helped define modern American liberalism, has been put up for sale, people briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Owners of New Republic Seek Sale or New Investors
